casebody.data:
No. 10-272. John Crane Inc., Petitioner v. Thomas F. Atwell, Jr., Executor of the Estate of Thomas F. Atwell, Deceased. 562 U.S. 1000, 131 S. Ct. 552,

178 L. Ed. 2d 367,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8501. November 1, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
